project.description:
Hive 4.x Metastore Client JARs for Spark Operator. Use with: spark.sql.hive.metastore.version=4.1.0 spark.sql.hive.metastore.jars=path spark.sql.hive.metastore.jars.path=file:///opt/spark/hive4
IsolatedClientLoader creates a child-first classloader, so we include ALL transitive dependencies to match what Maven downloads at runtime.
